page.title: 11 Medley Boatstation Oxford
page.content: Medley boatstation has been on Port Meadow for sometime.Because of its situation cars have to drive across the Meadow to get there.The problem is cars are not supposed to cross the Meadow as it disturbs the peace and frightens the horses. The owner of the boatyard wants to build on the Meadow.He wants to make Port Meadow into a leisure centre for holiday makers.As it is public land people have made an outcry. At the moment he has a small stretch of water for mooring boats.A petition went around to the local people and most of them were opposed to the expanding of the boat station.The owner has decided not to build on the meadow for a few years.
